text: @shahid_siddiqui @rahulkanwal @sardesairajdeep @virsanghvi @republic @TimesNow What r u trying 2 say? Some Indian Muslims creating havoc n r responsible 4 spreading Covid19 in India n Cipla headed by an Indian Muslim is trying hard 4 a vaccine. So, we shouldn't  say anything against Tablighis? Btw, virus won't differentiate betn any religion.
